item.title: Drin and surrounding area subsistence, 5th August
item.description:
The drain and are around it is subsiding due to weight of buses at the bus stop. The road needs substantial support here to take the weight of the new electric buses. This has been reported previously and nothing has been done and as a consequence is getting worse

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 192, Halfway Street, Longlands, Sidcup, London

item.title: Corner of Great Titchfield and Mortimer street ( for months now ), 5th August
item.description:
These traffic/ hole at traffic lights is a mess and has been for months? There should be some notice up why is it taking so long ??? Would not be allowed in Marylebone , so why here ? Local Councillors please sort this out , it’s been like this for Months now !

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 79-81, Mortimer Street, Fitzrovia, Camden Town, City of Westminster
Report on FixMyStreet
